price: 92. Diggah sinaamey tah sin diiniy inki diini kinniih, anu sin Rabbi kinniyok yoo inkittoysaay dibuk yoo uqbuda iyye Yalli.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhihi ummatukum ummatan wāḥidatan wa-anā rabbukum fa-uʿ'budūni
